title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform Engineering team. You will be responsible for building scalable microservices, working with cloud infrastructure, and mentoring junior developers. Strong experience with Python, AWS, and containerization technologies is required.

title: Cloud Data Engineer
summary: Join our Data Platform team as a Cloud Data Engineer. You will design and build data pipelines, work with large-scale data processing systems, and ensure data quality and reliability. Experience with GCP, BigQuery, and distributed computing frameworks is essential.

title: DevOps Specialist
summary: We need a DevOps Specialist to manage our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. You will work on automating deployments, managing Kubernetes clusters, and ensuring system reliability. Strong knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Infrastructure as Code is required.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Join our AI/ML team to build and deploy machine learning models at scale. You will work on model development, MLOps pipelines, and productionizing ML systems. Strong background in machine learning frameworks and statistical modeling is essential.

title: Frontend Developer
summary: We are seeking a Frontend Developer to create exceptional user experiences. You will work closely with designers and backend engineers to build responsive, accessible web applications. Expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern frontend development practices is required.

title: Product Manager
summary: Lead product development as a Product Manager in our growing product team. You will define product strategy, work with cross-functional teams, and drive product roadmaps. Strong analytical skills and experience in product management methodologies are essential.

title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Join our product engineering team as a Full Stack Developer. Build end-to-end web applications using modern JavaScript technologies. Work with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB database.

title: Data Scientist
summary: Drive data-driven insights as a Data Scientist. Analyze large datasets, build predictive models, and communicate findings to stakeholders. Strong statistical background required.

title: Security Engineer
summary: Protect our infrastructure as a Security Engineer. Conduct security assessments, implement security controls, and respond to incidents. Security certifications preferred.

title: Mobile Developer
summary: Build mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. Work with React Native and native technologies to create engaging mobile experiences.

title: QA Engineer
summary: Ensure product quality as a QA Engineer. Design and execute test plans, automate testing processes, and work closely with development teams.

title: UX Designer
summary: Create exceptional user experiences as a UX Designer. Conduct user research, design wireframes and prototypes, and collaborate with product teams.

title: Backend Developer
summary: Build robust backend systems as a Backend Developer. Design APIs, implement business logic, and ensure system scalability and performance.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
summary: Ensure system reliability as an SRE. Monitor production systems, automate operations, and improve system performance and availability.

title: Business Analyst
summary: Drive business improvements as a Business Analyst. Gather requirements, analyze processes, and work with stakeholders to implement solutions.

title: Technical Writer
summary: Create clear technical documentation as a Technical Writer. Document APIs, write user guides, and help developers and users understand our products.
